If you or someone you know is struggling with addiction, please consider reaching out for support. These services are usually available 24/7 and offer confidential support. Orders can be canceled within a specified timeframe before collection. If you need to cancel, please contact our customer service as soon as possible at info@bantukraal.com. If your order is already prepared, you may need to follow the return process after collecting the item. We offer world wide shipping. All items include the delivery fee. You will receive a email upon successful payment where tou can respond with your delivery information. Should you want to collect, pickup instructions will be included in the email , including the location and available collection times Please note that you must be of legal drinking age to purchase certain products. Proof of age may be required at the collection point, so please bring a valid ID with you to confirm your eligibility If an item is out of stock, you may have the option to sign up for notifications when it becomes available again. Alternatively, feel free to ask our team about possible alternatives or restocking timelines. We accept a variety of payment methods, including major credit and debit cards and mobile payments. Payment can be completed online when placing your order, or at the collection point if pre-arranged. We accept returns for items in their original, unopened condition within 14 days of collection. Please bring your proof of purchase to the collection point to facilitate the return. Refunds will be issued to the original payment method or as store credit. Please Note: Items include delivery charge, we will be in contact via email to get Delivery Details Our Products name Your Cart Checkout Event Booking Query Submit Date of Booking Email Address Name and Surname Phone Number The Request Already a user?
